thread.title: Report: Kim Kardashian cancels baby shower after Lamar Odom hospitalized
thread.title_full: Report: Kim Kardashian cancels baby shower after Lamar Odom hospitalized

author: wtopstaff
title: Report: Kim Kardashian cancels baby shower after Lamar Odom hospitalized
text:
Home » News » Entertainment » Report: Kim Kardashian cancels… Report: Kim Kardashian cancels baby shower after Lamar Odom hospitalized By ABC Radio | @ABCRadio October 16, 2015 7:30 am Peter Kramer/NBC 
(LAS VEGAS) — Kim Kardashian was undoubtedly close to Lamar Odom, the estranged husband of her younger sister,Khloe. So when Odom was hospitalized in Las Vegas earlier this week, Kim rushed to the hospital along with their mother, Kris Jenner. 
So a new E! News report that claims Kim has canceled her baby shower, which was scheduled for this weekend, comes as no surprise. 
“She’s totally focused on being there for Khloe right now,” a source said. 
Reportedly, Kim had been planning a baby shower for her second child with husband, Kanye West. The two, who wed in 2014, are expecting a baby boy December 25. They’re already parents to 2-year-old North. 
Sources say the baby shower’s theme was inspired by the 1989 film Troop Beverly Hills . The event was supposed to be hosted at the Beverly Hills home of Kim’s longtime friend, Allison Azoff. Interestingly, the home is where Khloe and Lamar wed in 2009. 
Odom was hospitalized in Las Vegas Tuesday after a stay at the Love Ranch in Crystal, Nevada, for a few days. Police said Wednesday that workers at the legal brothel told 911 dispatchers the former basketball player had been using cocaine and sexual enhancement drugs in the days before the incident. Odom remains hospitalized in Las Vegas. There’s been no update on his condition. 
According to E!, Kourtney Kardashian and Kendall Jenner are also at the hospital where Odom’s being cared for. Khloe also reportedly paid for Odom’s father, Joe, to fly into town, along with Odom’s children from a previous marriage, Destiny and Lamar Jr. Caitlyn Jenner is also said to be en route. 
Although Khloe filed for divorce from Odom in December 2013 amid reports of drug use and infidelity.
